Posts.Content: I am interested in reading more about this too.  How did you find info on what sort of alternative treatments to use?  There are so many websites, but you don't know which ones are real and which ones are scams!  My mom has stage 4 kidney cancer and she is willing to try anything.
Posts.Title: alternative treatments.

Posts.Content: Paxil is famous for horrible withdrawals!!  I hope that you slowly tappered off of it, that is the recommended way.  Suicidal thougts are very common after stopping any sort of antidepressant.  That is why you should always wean yourself off....if you look up Paxil withdrawals you will probably find many of the answers you are looking for.  I take Paxil also, and the warnings about withdrawing from it kind of scare me!  Good luck!!!
Posts.Title: Stopping Arimidex or Paxil Abruptly - Any suicidal thoughts???
